user.title: Window Buddy Setup
user.description: Configure your window settings. Choose a calculation method: Simple (azimuth only) or Precise (advanced configuration with blockades).

azimuth.title: Window Azimuth
azimuth.description: Enter the window's facing azimuth (0–360°). This determines the direction your window faces.

precise_extra.title: Advanced Precise Configuration
precise_extra.description:
Enter the window's width and height. Optionally, configure blockades for each side (Left, Right, Top, Bottom). For each direction, you may provide:
• A side distance (distance from the window's edge),
• A distance away (how far the obstacle is from the window),
• An angle (obstacle orientation).
For all measurements, use the same unit (e.g. cm or inches).
